name: Descent (TajRahal)
description:
Your younger sister Megan went missing a few days ago, and an eyewitness claims they spotted her hanging around an old woman’s house. Rumor has it that the woman hasn’t left her house in years, and that the house is haunted. You brace yourself as you walk in, solving mysteries and retracing your sister’s steps to find her. The house only gets stranger and stranger as you descend down the path of insanity. Will you be able to find your sister, or will you lose yourself within the walls of this house?

Created by Nagie Khant, Reece Sagun, and Mark Rahal for CMPM/ARTG 120 Spring 2018 at UC Santa Cruz.

Play the game without the setup hassle!
